    // This utility method will load the Intellimize snippet
    function loadIntellimize() {
      // Prevent multiple loads
      clearTimeout(intellimizeLoadTimer);
      if (intellimizeLoaded) return;
      intellimizeLoaded = true;
      // Load the snippet
      var intellimizeSnippet = document.createElement('script');
      intellimizeSnippet.type = 'text/javascript';
      intellimizeSnippet.async = false;
      intellimizeSnippet.src = 'https://api.intellimize.co/client/117290365.js';
      var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
      s.parentNode.insertBefore(intellimizeSnippet, s);
    }

    // Check if the personalizationData already has been loaded for this visitor
    var personalizationData = localStorage.getItem('rw_personalizationData');
    if (personalizationData === null) { // Data is not available. 
      // Set a callback to wait for Rollworks to finish loading prior to loading Intellimize
      window.onB2BPersonalizationDataReady = (function(personalizationData) {
        localStorage.setItem('rw_personalizationData', JSON.stringify(personalizationData));
        loadIntellimize();
      });
      // Fallback to try to load Intellimize after 1500ms if RollWorks fails to load
      intellimizeLoadTimer = setTimeout(function() { loadIntellimize(); }, 1500);
    } else { // Data is available.
      // Load Intellimize right away
      loadIntellimize();
    }
  })();
